title: Firefox no abre maximizado
content:
Buenas tardes,

La apliación de Firefox no abre maximizada. Incluso si la aplicación es cerrada maximizada, al abrirla nuevamente, aparece en miniatura.

Sin embargo, el ícono de maximizado aparece como no disponible, ya que la aplicación asume que Firefox está maximizado.

Firefox está actualizado.

Espero puedan ayudarme con este tema.

Saludos cordiales.
creator: maxiduranp

title: Open previous windows and tabs not working on firefox v117.0.1
content:
Hello,

recently i upgraded firefox to version 117.0.1. Soon after that when i close my firefox window and later than open new session, the old tabs do not reopen. This is even when i have "Open previous windows and tabs" option checked in general section of firefox setting. attached is the screenshot for the same. pls help.

Regards,
creator: ashishagrawal74

title: Strange file
content: When opening Firefox, I downloaded a random file called 9Xjh-hy_.htm. the file weighs 0B and is empty when opened. I don't know what this file is and whether it is a virus or not.

title: Restore previous tabs stopped working after updating to 117.0.1
content: Restore previous tabs stopped working after updating to 117.0.1, browser launches the home page instead. Settings unchanged since previous install (see screenshot). OS Win10.

title: Can't restore previous session
content: My laptop updated system just now without closing the browser. After restarting, there is no restore option for firefox. No recently closed taps and windows. But the history is correct stored. I had opened 3 windows with many tabs. I/m wondering if there is any method to restore the windows instead of click the history one by one. There are hundreds of tabs....

content:
used trouble shoot mode to figure out problem but want to return to previous settings do have file marked "old data" looked everywhere cannot see how to do it. Had FF just like i wanted it and do not want to have to reconfigure it all over

ty

title: Delete all firefox files
content: Firefox has a folder on my desktop that I do not want there. It will not let me delete the short cut. I uninstalled firefox and I still can't delete the short cut. I can't delete the files even though the browser is not on my computer any longer. Very annoying. Please help.
creator: daniel.riecker

title: Edge seems to be pushing out Firefox
content:
In going through and deleting my browser history, I find that they are labelled: 

C:\User\Marita Quality\App Data\Local\Microsoft\Edge\User Data\Default\History: ...

Nothing is labelled as been Firefox, but I consider that I am using Firfox as my browser. Has Misrcosoft Edge hijacked my computer?

Thanks

title: Mozilla Foxfire
content: mozilla firefox sound keep getting turned off. I go into Sounds Mixers & find the Mozilla Foxfire Sound has been disabled & I turn it back on, then a week or two later I can't hear any Sound on Youtube or any other platform.
creator: ergjam

title: Can't copy bookmarks into Other Bookmarks file
content:
I had to reinstall Firefox and restore my bookmarks from an HTML file. After the restore, I found I could only copy a few of my Bookmarks Toolbar and Other Bookmark links to the corresponding files in the new installation. I was only able to move the Toolbar bookmarks to the proper file because the old Toolbar file appeared on my toolbar, and I could move the bookmarks one by one to the toolbar until all were entered.

I'm faced with a similar problem with the Other Bookmarks (OB) file. I only have five or six bookmarks in the file, and I need to add about a dozen more. I tried copying and pasting them into the new file in the Bookmarks Manager; the bookmarks copied but would not paste into the file. (I know they copied because I successfully pasted them to a LibreOffice document.) I tried opening one of the copied links; it said it was in the OB file, but it wasn't listed. Why can't I just bulk-copy the bookmarks into the file in the Bookmarks Manager? If that isn't possible
creator: crogerblair1

title: KOHLS REVIEWS
content: Recently, Reviews are not showing up on the Kohls website. Is there anything I can do.
creator: CarolSaile
